about_the_game:
This is the Deathstate Soundtrack. Now you can experience the game's haunting, mystic, music in your everyday life.

Composed by Pete Johnson, Mike Burns and Theo Swartz, all 16 tracks from Deathstate are available here in high-quality MP3 format.

Track List
  • 1. Main Title
  • 2. Cutscenes
  • 3. Somewhere Between
  • 4. The Fortress of Koth
  • 5. The Ossein Swamp
  • 6. The Maze of Ix
  • 7. The Vestibule of Carcassus
  • 8. The Temple of Qit
  • 9. The Lost Arcanium
  • 10. The Grave of Time
  • 11. Desecration
  • 12. Approaching Boss
  • 13. Boss
  • 14. The Seat of the Arcanist
  • 15. Credits
detailed_description:
This is the Deathstate Soundtrack. Now you can experience the game's haunting, mystic, music in your everyday life.

Composed by Pete Johnson, Mike Burns and Theo Swartz, all 16 tracks from Deathstate are available here in high-quality MP3 format.

Track List
  • 1. Main Title
  • 2. Cutscenes
  • 3. Somewhere Between
  • 4. The Fortress of Koth
  • 5. The Ossein Swamp
  • 6. The Maze of Ix
  • 7. The Vestibule of Carcassus
  • 8. The Temple of Qit
  • 9. The Lost Arcanium
  • 10. The Grave of Time
  • 11. Desecration
  • 12. Approaching Boss
  • 13. Boss
  • 14. The Seat of the Arcanist

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete video card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Deathstate Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete video card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-integrated Graphics Cards, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: The Deathstate Soundtrack, containing mystic sounds from throughout the myriad planes.
